description.value: No one can match the pace at which elements flow from you. You're permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened]. You can use your extra action only to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Channel Elements], use a 1-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Elemental Blast], or use a 1-action stance impulse.
